revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)

|cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.6 GHz |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = Serial eMMC 5.1 3.3 |fla1_num = |fla1chip = SanDisk;SDINBDG4-16G;16GB (128Gb) MLC NAND Flash Serial eMMC 5.1 3.3V BGA153; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4F6E3S4HM-MGCJ;2GB (16Gb) LPDDR4 BGA200; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 2.0, HDMI, Mini PCIe |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = 2 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = USB Type-C |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, (115200 8N1),, J903 |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = Bluetooth LE, ZigBee, HDMI in/out, IrDA, 4K |addchip = ZigBee (RF4CE) Chip;Qorvo;GP502;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Pegatron |manuf_model = TX061AEI |manuf_rev = 1.0 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = Comcast |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/13/2018 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Technicolor UIW6019COM WiFi Module |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA6174A; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|Arris AX061AEI (Xi6-A)|Comcast}} :RAM is some variant of [https://www.SK hynix.com/products.do?lang=eng&ct1=36&ct2=40&ct3=&rc=auto#tg02 SK hynix LPDDR4]. ===Hardware=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM7268 @1.6GHz *Wi-Fi: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6174A *ZigBee: [[Qorvo]] GP502 (RF4CE chip) *10/100 Base-T Ethernet Isolation Transformer: [https://datasheet.lcsc.com/lcsc/1809140319_Bothhand-Enterprise-TS21CHF_C173179.pdf Bothhand TS21CHF] *MOSFET: [https://pdf1.alldatasheet.com/datasheet-pdf/view/1257137/VBSEMI/4435GM.html VBSemi 4435GM] ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.sagemcom.com/press-events/press-release/detail-view/news/ibc-2016-sagemcom-unveils-a-new-range-of-powerful-4k-uhd-hdr-set-top-boxes/ ''Powerful 4K UHD HDR Set-Top-Boxes'' on '''Sagemcom'''] :[https://browser.primatelabs.com/v4/cpu/2674155 ''Xi6 Hardware: Broadcom BCM7268 (1.5GHz)''] *[https://sites.google.com/view/droid-tv/pay-tv-provider ''Pay TV and OTT Providers: Using Android TV for set-top-box''] :[[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/broadband/set-top-box/bcm7251 BCM7251S] - Dual-core @1.7GHz :[[Broadcom]] BCM7252 - Dual-core @1.5GHz :[[Broadcom]] BCM7252S - Dual-core @1.7GHz :[[Broadcom]] BCM7268 - Quad-core @1.6GHz :[[Broadcom]] BCM7271 - Quad-core @1.6GHz ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== UART: J903, Baud: 115200 ===Bootlog=== {{SCollapse|Bootlog • >> |
[A1][M1][A][M][B1][B]
